audioText: Quand nous étions enfants, nous pouvions jouer dehors jusqu'à très tard en été.
question: What could they do when they were children?
options: Play outside until very late in summer
Go to bed early every night
explanation: The text states 'Quand nous étions enfants, nous pouvions jouer dehors jusqu'à très tard en été' - When we were children, we could play outside until very late in summer. 'Pouvions' is the 1st person plural imperfect tense of 'pouvoir' (to be able to/can), describing a past habitual ability.
